body:
Everything on my Mac+ Minecraft is going terribly slow

Any suggestions/advice? Need it badly :P
body_tagged:
Everything on my Mac+ Minecraft is going terribly slow

Any suggestions/advice? Need it badly :P
title: Help!

replies.body: Maybe it's because you have everything on max?...
replies.body_tagged: Maybe it's because you have everything on max?...

replies.body: Well yeah, if everything is in max then it's going to drop your frames.
replies.body_tagged: Well yeah, if everything is in max then it's going to drop your frames.

replies.body:
I assume you meant everything on your Mac.

I don't really know, I used to use a Mac and yeah, it was really slow. But I just got a Windows pc. That's the only solution I know. Sorry :)
replies.body_tagged:
I assume you meant everything on your Mac.

I don't really know, I used to use a Mac and yeah, it was really slow. But I just got a Windows pc. That's the only solution I know. Sorry :)

replies.body: apples trash, and why run everything on high
replies.body_tagged: apples trash, and why run everything on high

replies.body: Well it's a Mac, there's your problem. Get a PC.
replies.body_tagged: Well it's a Mac, there's your problem. Get a PC.

replies.body: What are you running? (Model? Year made? Macbook/iMac?)
replies.body_tagged: What are you running? (Model? Year made? Macbook/iMac?)

replies.body:
U guy FUKIN srs? Mac isn't bad. It's as good as PC. Btw I have 2012 Mac air and I can use Final Cut Pro x, Photoshop, and many programs with no problem. Mine craft isnt that hard as others. If you wanna get good fps, the solution isn't going Mac to PC. Mac is better then you guys guess. 

And 'but a new pc' isn't a real solution. But 'clean your data/Use Dr. cleaner/ set your mc settings lower' is a solution

replies.body:
Enough with the "play on Mac" crap.

What model Mac do you have? And how much storage space is left?
replies.body_tagged:
Enough with the "play on Mac" crap.

What model Mac do you have? And how much storage space is left?

replies.body: I know from personal experience that updating your applications and updating your system can make things a lot faster.
replies.body_tagged: I know from personal experience that updating your applications and updating your system can make things a lot faster.

replies.body: If it is an old model then it is just the computer getting old. I had a Macbook 2009 and it was just really slow. I now have a iMac Late 2013 Model and can run Minecraft, edit and upload videos fine. Everything I need.
replies.body_tagged: If it is an old model then it is just the computer getting old. I had a Macbook 2009 and it was just really slow. I now have a iMac Late 2013 Model and can run Minecraft, edit and upload videos fine. Everything I need.
